tagline: Your premier destination for comfortable dormitory stays and versatile hall rentals.

sorryYouCannotBookTwice: Sorry, you cannot book a dormitory more than once for the same start day with the same phone number. If you need to make changes, please contact us.

paymentNotExpectedOrAlreadyProcessed: Payment is not expected for this booking at its current stage, or it has already been processed.
completeYourPaymentDescription: Please follow the instructions below to complete your booking payment.
paymentReferenceNote: Important: Use your Booking ID ({bookingId}) as the payment reference/reason.
paymentReferenceNoteConfirmationPage: Important: Use your Booking ID ({bookingId}) as the payment reference/reason when making the transfer.
telegramProofSubmissionInstruction: After making the bank transfer, please send a screenshot or photo of your payment receipt to our Telegram bot ({botUsername}) using the phone number: {phoneNumber}. Our team will verify your payment.
afterSendingProofAdminWillVerify: After sending proof, an admin will verify your payment to confirm the booking.
missingBookingId: Booking ID is missing from the request.
paymentAwaitingTelegramVerificationDesc: Your payment is awaiting verification via Telegram. Please ensure you have sent your proof of payment to our bot.
thankYouFacilityBookingWillBeReviewed: Thank you! Your booking request for the facility has been received and will be reviewed by our team. We will contact you shortly regarding the next steps, including payment and agreement details if applicable.
yourBookingRequestHasBeenProcessed: Your booking request has been processed. Please check the details below.
incompleteBookingConfirmationDetails: Incomplete booking confirmation details. Please go back and try again or contact support.
discoverMoreSubtitle: Scan the QR code to view our digital brochure and learn more about our services and facilities.
brochureDormitoriesDesc: Well-maintained and secure dormitory rooms suitable for individuals and groups, offering a comfortable stay.
brochureHallsDesc: Modern halls and sections equipped for conferences, workshops, meetings, and various events, with flexible capacities.
brochureCateringDesc: Delicious and customizable catering options for your events, including lunch, refreshment, and coffee break services.
brochureAboutUsContent: {siteName} is dedicated to providing high-quality rental services for dormitories and event facilities. We aim to offer a seamless booking experience with excellent amenities and customer support, catering to both individual and organizational needs in Adama and the surrounding Oromia region.
brochureKeyFeaturesMore: ...and many more amenities to ensure a productive and comfortable experience.
brochureWhyChooseCompetitivePricing: Competitive pricing for all our services.
brochureWhyChooseCommitmentToQuality: Focus on quality and maintaining high standards.
brochureCallToActionTitle: Get in Touch or Book Today!
brochureCallToActionDesc: We are here to assist you with your accommodation and event needs. Contact us for more information or proceed to book online.
pageNotFoundMessage: Oops! The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved. Let's get you back on track.
contactUsSubtitle: We're here to help! Reach out to us through any of the channels below or contact our building administrators directly for specific dormitory inquiries.
contactBuildingAdminsDesc: For inquiries related to specific dormitory buildings and room assignments, please contact the respective administrators.
generalInquiriesDesc: For general questions, partnerships, or feedback about our services.
workingHoursNote: Our office hours are {hours}. We aim to respond to all inquiries promptly.
mapPlaceholder: Google Maps embed will be here.
searchByNamePhoneId: Search by guest name, phone, or Booking ID...

keyholderOnlyPage: This page is accessible only by authorized Keyholders.
duplicateCheckSkippedBookingProceeds: Duplicate booking check skipped due to missing database index. Booking will proceed. Please inform the admin.
